nl.inl.blacklab.mocks

Class MockSpanQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.Query
      • org.apache.lucene.search.spans.SpanQuery
        • nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene.BLSpanQuery
          • nl.inl.blacklab.mocks.MockSpanQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class MockSpanQuery
extends BLSpanQuery
    Stub SpanQuery class for testing. Takes arrays and iterates through 'hits' from these arrays.

      • reverseMatchingCost

        public long reverseMatchingCost(org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader reader)
        Description copied from class: BLSpanQuery
        Return an (very rough) indication of how many hits this clause might return. Used to decide what parts of the query to match using the forward index. Based on term frequency, which are combined using simple rules of thumb. Another way to think of this is an indication of how much computation this clause will require when matching using the reverse index.
        Specified by:
        reverseMatchingCost in class BLSpanQuery
        Parameters:
        reader - the index reader
        Returns:
        rough estimation of the number of hits

      • forwardMatchingCost

        public int forwardMatchingCost()
        Description copied from class: BLSpanQuery
        Return an (very rough) indication of how expensive finding a match for this query using an NFA would be. Used to decide what parts of the query to match using the forward index.
        Specified by:
        forwardMatchingCost in class BLSpanQuery
        Returns:
        rough estimation of the NFA complexity
